descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/y7gbFOH.png[/img]

[size=6][b]DRELDYN[/b]'s ORIGINAL [color=#660000]M[/color][color=#900000]A[/color][color=#cc0000]I[/color][color=#e06666]N[/color] [color=#ea9999]M[/color][color=#f4cccc]E[/color]NU OV[color=#d9d2e9]E[/color][color=#b4a7d6]R[/color][color=#8e7cc3]H[/color][color=#674ea7]A[/color][color=#351c75]U[/color][color=#20124d]L
[/color][/size][color=#8e7cc3]
[/color]

[youtube]_09PSNAtHiE[/youtube][/center][center]
[size=4]This Mod replaces the following: [/size]
[color=#ff7700][size=3]Main Menu Graphic [/size]
[size=2]Main Menu Music [/size][/color]

[size=4]This Mod removes the following:[/size]
[color=#ff7700][size=3]Imperial Legion Logo[/size][/color]

[size=1]_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/size]

[size=4]Dieser Mod ersetzt die folgenden :[/size]
[color=#ff7700][size=2]Hauptmenü Grafik
Hauptmenü Musik[/size][/color]

[size=4]Dieser Mod entfernt die folgenden :[/size]
[color=#ff7700]Kaiserliche Legion Logo[/color]



[color=#6fa8dc][size=4]Compatible[/size][/color] with anything that doesn't alter the following:
[color=#ff7700]logo.nif
mus_maintheme.xwm
mainmenuwallpaper.dds[/color]





[size=3]A [/size][size=6][b]MASSIVE[/b][/size][size=3] thank you to those who have voted, endorsed and downloaded my mod.


[/size][img]http://i.imgur.com/ihWec6P.png[/img]


[/center]
